At the same time, we hope to provide app creators with a place to showcase their products and connect with users. The core feature, Search, uses a combination of data from Crunchbase, Twitter, blogs, as well an index of each app's site to provide relevant results. Industries: App Discovery, SaaS, Software
Industry Groups: Apps, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: Cloud-based IT Systems Management
Full Description: ITSCAPE provides a new generation of low-cost, high-quality, easy-to-use cloud-based system management products. Companies are losing $26.5B every year due to outages and unplanned downtime. A major contributor to these outages is the difficulty managing the rapidly increasing complexity of IT environments created by virtualization and cloud technologies. Business applications and processes are more complex to manage as they are no longer contained to a few servers in a datacenter, but spread out across many physical and virtual servers inside and outside a company. This creates a lack of visibility of where applications reside and what servers or components they are dependent on. IT managers often have no idea of which servers, databases, connection, and more support their companies business-critical services. Simple changes to a single server can cause major outages.  ITSCAPE provides a new, cloud-based, affordable, and easy way to perform application discovery, application dependency mapping map, and change tracking in an IT environment –including elements that are physical, virtual, or in the cloud.  With ITSCAPE, IT managers get an accurate and comprehensive understanding of all of the servers, applications, databases, and communications in their datacenter, see the relationships between these IT components, and get clear visibility into the IT systems that support their company’s business critical services.  This information can then be used to pinpoint or prevent issues that cause performance problems, outages and downtime.  ITSCAPE helps IT managers more quickly resolve service issues, keep an accurate view of "who changed what when." ITSCAPE can also be used to prepare to optimize IT systems or for datacenter transformation initiatives such as  virtualization, consolidation, and/or migration.  Traditional auto-discovery and dependency mapping solutions are expensive to purchase, install, and maintain. ITSCAPE is changing this.  ITSCAPE requires no hardware, expensive training classes, or consulting services and is priced to be affordable for small to medium sized businesses.  Next, ITSCAPE can be set up and functioning in minutes, is self-maintaining, requires no upgrades, and has little to no impact on existing IT systems. Finally, it can provide initial discovery and dependency mapping results in an hour or less and is easy-to-use and understand by both technical and non-technical staff.

Description: MyStream is a Patented Cloud Platform providing live sync directly between devices, enabling entirely new dynamic functionalities wirelessly
Full Description: MyStream® is a cutting edge Cloud Communications company.  MyStream®'s Patented Technologies create a revolutionary Mesh Mobile Cloud that extends all the way to the device's level, unlocking entirely new functionalities & possibilities for secure, direct & dynamic digital communications, supporting real-time wireless uses both online & off.  By finally merging the Cloud with direct and wireless communications, the MyStream® Cloud not only enables perviously impossible live communications, directly and wireless, via Bluetooth and/or Wifi, but also previously impossible real-time communications and efficiencies, Globally, via Internet. Beyond enabling previously impossible run-time functionalities without central servers, thereby eliminating associated waste, security vulnerabilities & operating cost, MyStream® Clouds also improve reception with each added device, even when co-located, flipping today's wireless communications paradigm. Called a "leader and success" by Investors Business Daily, and an "Awesome App" by Rolling Stone, MyStream®'s Proprietary Frameworks can be leveraged & licensed for newly possible and customizable uses and data types, including; Emergency Communications; On-Site Clouds; Multiplayer Games; Automated Security; Live Streaming; IoT; Vehicle-to-Device Apps; Mobile Tokens, Transactions & Exchanges; Next-Generation Wireless Blockchains; & more. Originally developed to enable people to connect, directly and wirelessly, to share synchronous AV experiences, without needing an Internet connection or extra hardware, with the development of the core MyStream technology, this goal to finally enable people to “Share Music, Not Headphones!”™ which was MyStream®’s initial commercialization, represented not only the first of it’s kind solution to that problem, but much, much more.

Industries: Android, App Discovery, App Marketing, Apps, iOS, Mobile Apps, Mobile Devices, Social Media, Software
Industry Groups: Apps, Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Platforms, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: WhoYou is an app which allows people to connect & chat with each other based on the same words and phrases that they're searching for.
Full Description: Problem: Today, users of social media have no choice but to have their online experience dictated to them by other users & businesses as they push their opinions, politics, humor, ads, and more out to the world with little regard for the psychological effect that content and privacy-abusing advertising can have on people and society as a whole. It’s for these reasons that over half of all Americans agree that social media is a negative influence on the world. Businesses’ (especially SMBs) only way of knowing when and why people are interested in their products is reactively, once they have been exposed to their advertising. These companies are losing out on a completely untapped area of business-to-customer communication where, preemptively, companies are able to generate revenue from customers who have never interacted with their advertising in any way.  Solution: WhoYou allows users to have complete control over their social media experience because, for the user, YOU are the master of the content that you see, hear, and feel. You are able to pull out the information from other users that you’re interested in, freeing you from the incessant negativity that is now available. For businesses, user’s cynical insinuations caused by your advertising will disappear, as you will be able to communicate in a real, unobtrusive human manner with those people most interested in the products and services that you provide, in a completely preemptive manner. This is a completely new way to connect and it’s not just exciting because it’s different, it’s exciting because it’s better. WhoYou Mission Statement: We are a tool for connecting like-minded users, creating human understanding from a technology application. We seek to eliminate unwanted peer-to-peer interactions by enabling positivity and good-natured conversations for all users and aim to divest humanity from the cynicism and hate that is pervasive on social media. All social media today is push-oriented meaning users push their opinions, politics, humor and more onto each other. WhoYou is the first ever pull-oriented connection application. Users pull the information out from one another that they are interested in, enabling positive, value-added interactions. WhoYou is the ultimate combination between a search engine and a social media platform. No other company provides this same service! How it Works: A user sets their geographic area and searches for a word or phrase. They can also add connotation to their search to give it specificity. If another user in their area is searching for the same word or phrase, their profile will appear (a little bio, pictures, other searches). The original user can take a look and then send them a message. The receiver can preview the message before they accept it. If they do accept the message, a conversation can begin.  Here’s a quick example; you set your area for 10 miles and search for “Angel Investor”. You can add specificity to your search by adding “Let’s talk about…” Anyone else searching for “Angel Investor” within 10 miles will appear. You can then look at their profile and if you like what you see, you can send them a message. If they accept, you can start chatting!

Description: A disruptive mobile discovery platform that unlocks greater access to quality apps through an innovative, exploratory visual interface.
Full Description: Yttro is a disruptive mobile discovery platform that unlocks greater access to quality apps through an innovative, exploratory visual interface. In an exploding app market where anything not on the ‘Top’ lists effectively doesn’t exist, Yttro's machine learning algorithms instead map out a myriad of games in a patent-pending, touch-driven interface that is intuitive and delightful to use. This provides more mobile apps with unprecedented visibility by exposing the long-tailed distribution beneath the top charts. From a user’s perspective, Yttro offers no-holds-barred access to a much fuller buffet of mobile game options, and an intuitive, relevant discovery experience that yields valuable installs in alignment with user intent. For developers, Yttro's seamless incorporation of promotional and native content enables developers to connect directly, and in the most non-intrusive way, with potential leads while keeping their marketing budgets slim.
